div.p:
Curia gilde tenta in pretorio per Ricardum de Kintor prepositum decimo quarto die mensis
Decembris anno Domini et cetera lxxjo
Eodem die Willelmus sar in amerciamento curie quia non comparuit coram preposito vt obligatur pro foristallacione

Johannes litstar de grene' in amerciamento curie quia non intrauit vnum forisstallatorem pro quo deuenit fide
iussorem

Gilbertus leche in amerciamento curie quia non intrauit andream burges et alexandrum glenny coram preposito
pro forisstallacione pro quibus deuenit fideiussorem

Johannes de Kintor in amerciamento curie quia non intrauit vnum forisstallatorem coram preposito pro forisstallacione
pro quo deuenit fideiussorem

Ricardus de culan'
Willelmus maliceson'
Willelmus mor'
Johannes nachty
Jacobus craike
Johannes gilber glenmalyne
patricius faber
Johannes chapman
Dauid bog

Burgenses et confratres gilde facti tempore prepositure Ricardi de Kintor
Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo sexagesimo secundo

Dauit de achnahuf' Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde ad
instanciam Willelmi fodringham burgensis istius burgi et commorantis in villa de
perth cui promissum fuit habere liberis libertatem burgensem Racione quorundam laborum alias factorum
per ipsum Willelmum concernencium . istud burgum . plegio Adam craufurde quod non
forisstabit forisstallabit priuilegium burgi

Eodem die Jacobus filius andree posuit in voluntate prepositi pro foristallacione lane
et pellium

Duodecimo die mensis octobris anno Domini et cetera lxiijo Angusius lilburne' deuenit plegius pro alexandro balcromby
foristallatore preposito et balliuis ad intrandum se coram preposito pro foristallacione die veneris xxviijo die mensis antedicti
ad subeundum legem pro predicta forisstallacione /

Curia gilde tenta per Ricardum de Kintor prepositum huius burgi in pretorio eiusdem septimo die mensis
Octobris Anno Domini et cetera sexagesimo tercio

Quo die subscripte persone electe fuerunt in communi consilio
Alexander de camera
Andreas meignes
Johannes de fyfe
Johannes de marr'
Johannes scrogis
Andreas de culane
Willelmus scherar'
Andreas filius alani
Matheus fechat
Johannes henrici de culan
Johannes vokate
Willelmus rolande
Patricius de badenache
henricus ruthirfurde /
gilbertus Waus'
Andreas Rede
Johannes Knollis
Jacobus meignes
Willelmus vokat
Robertus de culane
Dauid simson'
Adam de craufurde
Dauid blabir'

The samyn day it ordanyt and decretyt be the aldirman and the hale consale and merchandis for the
profite of merchandice that na merchande man tap na sell salt Irine terr' and sape bettir chape na it /
is statute that is to say the pek of salt for vj d' and the less' mesuris that eftir' the boll of salt for
vj s' viij d' / the stane of Irine for xxxij d' and it be salde in gret as the merchande kan accorde
the pynt of terr' for vj d' / the punde of sape for iiij d' and be the dusan for iij s' and na less'
And quhat merchande that be taynt be his nichbur' brekande this statute he sal pay viij s' on
forgiffine til ane vnlaw and that als oft / as he be taynt / And quhat nichbur' that presentis the
taynt on his nichbur' to the aldirman or to the bailyeis he sal hafe ij s' of his vnlaw til
his rawarde als oft as he presentis ony taynt of breking of this forsaide statute And the aldirman
and bailyeis sall tak inquisicione ilke lachfull day gif ony merchandis be brekaris of the saide statut /
Item it is ordanyt that na hukstaris tape in thair' buthis salt vndir the payn of eschete of it /

Item it is ordanyt and statute be the aldirman and hale counsale that na vnfre man occupy merchan
dise in bying nor selling / nothir' to burgh nor lande vndir the payn of eschete of his gudis

Item that na freman duellande within the burgh occupy vtow the burgh merchandice othir'
in bying or selling na to bruke na takkis of the burgh vndir the payn forsaide

Item that thar be na vnfre man made burges for a yer' but the consent of xij personis of the
counsale at the leste bot gif he be a burges son'

Item that na freman colour' within the burgh na vnfre mennys gudis vndir the payn of
v merkis on forgiffine

Item it is ordanyt be the hale counsale that quhat tyme the aldirman has ado with thaim for
the common' profite of the tone' and saidis for thaim and warnys thaim nicht befor' quha beis
absent and cummys nocht on the morne' he sall pay vnforgiffin' xij d' to the lafe of the
consale bot gif thai hafe lauchfull essonye /

Die lune proxima post festum beati michaelis archangeli videlicet secundo die mensis octobris anno
domini et cetera lxiiijto

quo die Ricardus de Kyntor electus fuit in officio prepositure huius burgi
pro anno sequenti ad quod fideliter iuxta posse faciendum prestitit Juramentum solitum

Item eodem die Andreas scherar' Alexander blindsele thomas de camera et Johannes de
Kyntor electi fuerunt in officio balliuorum huius burgi pro anno sequenti ad quod fideliter faciendum
iuxta posse ipsorum quilibet ipsorum prestitit Juramentum solitum

Item eodem die Alexander andirson' Johannes Waus' Willelmus atkinson' et laurencius filius thome
electi fuerunt officio seriandorum huius burgi et cetera prestiterunt solita Juramenta

Curia gilde tenta in pretorio huius burgi per prefatum prepositum sexto die mensis octobris anno
et cetera lxiiijto

quo die subscripte persone electi sunt in communi consilio pro anno sequenti
Alexander de camera

- Johannes de fyfe

. Willelmus vokate
. Robertus de culane
. Dauid simson'
. Dauid blabir'

foristallatores

Item andreas birde couictus conuictus fuit per assisam pro empcione lane et pro vendicione salis et pro
empcione pellium posuit se in voluntate prepositi

Item andreas Willamson' conuictus fuit per assisam pro empcione lane / et posuit se in voluntate
prepositi pro empcione pellium

Item Johannes patrikson' apud fyvy conuictus fuit pro empcione lane et vendicione salis et bitu
minis et posuit se in voluntate prepositj pro empcione pellium
Item Johannes andirson' apud Rayne posuit se in voluntate prepositi pro empcione pellium

Subscripte persone sunt electe per commune consilium aud ad audiendum computum Andree menyes
de officio prepositure et computum ecclesie a Johanne de scrogis videlicet
Johannes de fyfe
Andreas filius alani
Andreas de culane
Johannes de scrogis
Dauid simson'
Andreas meignes
Johannes henrici culan
Matheus fechat
Patricius de badenach
Willelmus Rollande

Item it is ordanyt and statute be the aldirman and the hale consale that the forstallaris bath to
burgh and lande be punyst eftir' the alde actis made of befor' but remissione'

Item ony merchande man that conselys or puttis furthe ony vnfremannys gudis sal be punyst
eftir the alde actis on the samyn wyse

Curia gilde tenta per Ricardum de Kintor prepositum in pretorio huius burgi xxvjto die
mensis aprilis anno Domini et cetera lxvto

quo die Will thomas maliceson' conuictus fuit per
assisam pro foristallacione lane et pellium

Eodem die prepositus et consules concesserunt Willelmo de lammynton carnifici firmam
suam de pretorio vnius anni allocando andree scherar' balliuo ut computo suo

Eodem die Willelmus gray, Alexander de haya, Johannes de hill', Adam andirson', Johannes gregory, Jacobus clerke, et Dauid de hill, prescripte persone sunt conuicti pro foristallacione
lane et pellium per bonam assisam

Introitus bonorum Laurencij Johneson' de flisching in zelandia anno
Domini et cetera lxvto In primis vjc salis Item iij pipis vini
